description: Unique identifier for the establishment (restaurant)|10-digit integer, static per restaurant permit
Establishment (restaurant) name|DBA= Doing Business As|Public business name, may change at discretion of restaurant owner

Borough of establishment (restaurant) location|• 1 = MANHATTAN
• 2 = BRONX
• 3 = BROOKLYN
• 4 = QUEENS
• 5 = STATEN ISLAND
• Missing|NOTE: There may be discrepancies between zip code and listed boro due to differences in an establishment's mailing address and physical location
Phone number|Phone number provided by restaurant owner/manager
Establishment (restaurant) cuisine|Optional field provided by provided by restaurant owner/manager
NOTE: Inspection dates of 1/1/1900 mean an establishment has not yet had an inspection

Action associated with each establishment (restaurant) inspection|• Violations were cited in the following area(s).
• No violations were recorded at the time of this inspection.
• Establishment re-opened by DOHMH
• Establishment re-closed by DOHMH
• Establishment Closed by DOHMH.  Violations were cited in the following area(s) and those requiring immediate action were addressed.
• "Missing" = not yet inspected
Violation code associated with an establishment (restaurant) inspection
Violation description associated with an establishment  (restaurant) inspection

Indicator of critical violation|• Critical
• Not Critical
• Not Applicable|Critical violations are those most likely to contribute to foodborne illness
Total score for a particular inspection|Scores are updated based on adjudication results

Grade associated with the inspection|• N= Not Yet Graded
• A = Grade A
• B = Grade B
• C = Grade C
• Z = Grade Pending
• P=Grade Pending issued on re-opening following an initial inspection that resulted in a closure|Grades given during a reopening inspection are derived from the previous re-inspection
Date when grade was issued to the establishment (restaurant)
Date record was added to dataset|Dataset updated daily
